Privacy Policy

Your privacy is important to us. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

Last updated: August 26, 2025

Information We Collect

Automatically Collected Information

  • Log data (IP address, browser type, pages visited)
  • Device information (device type, operating system)
  • Usage statistics and analytics data
  • Cookies and similar tracking technologies

Information You Provide

  • Contact information when you reach out to us
  • Comments and feedback on blog posts
  • Any information you voluntarily submit through contact forms

How We Use Your Information

Website Improvement

  • Analyze website traffic and usage patterns
  • Improve user experience and content
  • Optimize website performance

Communication

  • Respond to your inquiries and comments
  • Send updates about new content (if requested)
  • Provide technical support when needed

Third-Party Services

Services We Use

Google Analytics

For website analytics and traffic monitoring

Disqus

For blog comments and user engagement

GitHub Pages

For website hosting and content delivery

Cookies

For user preferences and analytics

These services may collect data according to their own privacy policies. Please review their policies for more information.

Data Protection

Security Measures

  • HTTPS encryption for all data transmission
  • Regular security updates and monitoring
  • Limited access to personal information

Data Retention

  • Analytics data: Retained according to Google Analytics policy
  • Contact information: Kept only as long as necessary
  • Comments: Stored according to Disqus policy

Privacy Policies for My Projects

Each of my projects may have specific privacy considerations. Below are the privacy policies for individual projects:

ZimCharades

A fun word guessing game featuring Zimbabwean culture

Data Collection:
  • Game scores and progress (stored locally)
  • Basic usage analytics (anonymized)
  • No personal information required
Data Usage:
  • Improve game mechanics and content
  • Track popular categories and words
  • Performance optimization
Visit Project

ZIMSA

Zimbabwe Medical Students Association website

Data Collection:
  • Member registration information
  • Event participation data
  • Contact forms and inquiries
Data Usage:
  • Member communication and updates
  • Event organization and management
  • Educational content delivery
Visit Project

Storybase

African-focused short stories and book reading app

Data Collection:
  • User accounts and preferences
  • Reading progress and bookmarks
  • Comments and ratings
Data Usage:
  • Personalized reading recommendations
  • Content curation and improvement
  • Community features and engagement
In Development

MedBase

Medical database and learning platform

Data Collection:
  • User accounts and academic progress
  • Study materials and notes
  • Performance analytics
Data Usage:
  • Personalized learning paths
  • Academic performance tracking
  • Educational content optimization
Special Considerations:
  • HIPAA compliance for medical data
  • Encrypted storage of sensitive information
  • Limited access to academic records

General Privacy Principles for All Projects

Data Minimization

We only collect data that is necessary for the project's functionality

No Third-Party Sharing

User data is never sold or shared with third parties

User Control

Users can request data deletion or modification at any time

Open Source Commitment

Many projects are open source for transparency

Project-Specific Privacy Questions?

For questions about privacy practices for a specific project, please contact us at tanaka@tanakamawere.co.zw with the project name in the subject line.

Your Rights

You have the right to:

Access your personal data
Correct inaccurate information
Request data deletion
Opt-out of data collection

Cookies Policy

We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. Types of cookies we use:

Cookie Type Purpose Duration
Essential Basic website functionality Session
Analytics Website traffic analysis 2 years
Preferences Remember your settings (theme, etc.) 1 year
You can manage cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling cookies may affect website functionality.

Contact Us

If you have questions about this privacy policy or your personal data, please contact us:

Email

tanaka@tanakamawere.co.zw

Website

tanakamawere.co.zw

Policy Updates

Changes to This Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. When we do, we will:

  • Update the "Last updated" date at the top of this page
  • Notify users of significant changes through the website
  • Maintain previous versions for reference when possible

We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information.
